mapper.select: SELECT MEMBERNUM, USER_ID, USER_NICK, USER_MAIL, JOIN_DT, POINT, GRADE FROM ( SELECT MEMBERNUM, USER_ID, USER_NICK, USER_MAIL, JOIN_DT, POINT, GRADE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY JOIN_DT) AS MEMBERNUM, I.USER_ID, I.USER_NICK, I.USER_MAIL, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(I.JOIN_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'YY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DT, G.POINT, G.GRADE FROM TBL_USERINFO I JOIN VIEW_MEMBERPOINT M ON I.USER_ID = M.USER_ID JOIN VIEW_MEMBERGRADE G ON G.USER_ID = M.USER_ID ORDER BY MEMBERNUM DESC ) WHERE MEMBERNUM <= #{total} - ((#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}) ) WHERE MEMBERNUM > #{total} - (#{pageNum}*#{amount})

SELECT NVL(SUM(COUNT(*)),0) FROM ( SELECT NVL(POINT_Y, '관리자 등록') AS POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT, SUM(POINT) OVER(ORDER BY POINT_DT) AS USER_POINT FROM (SELECT POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT FROM TBL_POINT P LEFT JOIN TBL_POINT_Y PY ON PY.POINT_Y_CD = P.POINT_Y_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USERINFO U ON P.USER_CD = U.USER_CD WHERE U.USER_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT NULL, GTPOINT_DT AS POINT_DT, GTPOINT AS POINT FROM TBL_GTPOINT GT LEFT JOIN TBL_USERINFO U ON GT.USER_CD = U.USER_CD WHERE U.USER_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY POINT_DT DESC) GROUP BY (POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT, USER_POINT)

SELECT POINTNUM, POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT, USER_POINT FROM ( SELECT POINTNUM, POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT, USER_POINT FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY POINT_DT) AS POINTNUM, NVL(POINT_Y, '관리자 등록') AS POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT, SUM(POINT) OVER(ORDER BY POINT_DT) AS USER_POINT FROM (SELECT POINT_Y, POINT_DT, POINT FROM TBL_POINT P LEFT JOIN TBL_POINT_Y PY ON PY.POINT_Y_CD = P.POINT_Y_CD LEFT JOIN TBL_USERINFO U ON P.USER_CD = U.USER_CD WHERE U.USER_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} UNION SELECT NULL, GTPOINT_DT AS POINT_DT, GTPOINT AS POINT FROM TBL_GTPOINT GT LEFT JOIN TBL_USERINFO U ON GT.USER_CD = U.USER_CD WHERE U.USER_ID = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ORDER BY POINTNUM DESC ) WHERE POINTNUM <= #{total} - ((#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}) ) WHERE POINTNUM > #{total} - (#{pageNum}*#{amount})
